name: audit-log-query-ack
description: Acknowledgment response for an audit log query request containing the matching log records.

fields.name: audit-log
fields.description: The object identifier of the audit log being queried.

fields.name: records
fields.description: A list of audit log records that match the query criteria.

fields.name: no-more-items
fields.description: Indicates whether there are no more records available beyond those returned.
